long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Admeridian presents Admerido - A Minimal New Tab Google extension.

It's easy to give your Chrome New Tab window a new look with Admerido. By installing this extension, you can replace your current New Tab window with a sleek interface featuring unlimited exotic wallpapers.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept the installation of the Admerido extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing, as described by the service in EULA(https://www.admeridian.com/) and Privacy Policy(https://www.admeridian.com/privacypolicy.html).

Here are some features of Admerido:
Download Unlimited exotic wallpapers
Minimal Date and time display
Google Maps
Accurate clock & date and time
